```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggfortify)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r}
load("wti_project.Rda")
```

```{r}
summary(wti.xts)
```


Daily returns

```{r}
autoplot(wti.xts)
autoplot(wti.return)
autoplot(wti.combined$`30-day`)
autoplot(wti.combined$`5-day`)
```


Times series exploration 

```{r}
acf(wti.return, lag.max = 50)
```
